summary: Diff implements three independent filter controls (min category, max category, zone) in DiscoverFilters, adds a reusable Uruguay departments list, and stores/persists the three selections in DiscoverScreen state. Potential mismatch: the visible option labels/default text are in Spanish rather than the explicitly specified English strings (“1st…7th”, “All departments”).

missing_requirements.requirement: Minimum category and Maximum category each offer exactly 7 options labeled “1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th, 5th, 6th, 7th”.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows 7 options, but their labels are “1era, 2da, 3era, 4ta, 5ta, 6ta, 7ma” rather than the explicitly specified “1st…7th”.
The diff includes an all-departments option, but it is defined/displayed as “Todos los departamentos” instead of the explicitly specified “All departments”.

hallucinated_features.description: Resetting the Discover card index and passed-users set when any filter selection changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to store/persist the filter selections and update UI; resetting card navigation state on filter change was not requested.
